data.title: Death of Mughal Emperor Akbar - This Day in History | Testbook.com
data.meta_description: Learn about the life, reign, and death of Mughal Emperor Akbar, his administration, and his contributions to Indian history. Get to know more about his religious tolerance, military innovations and the Mughal Empire under his reign.
data.text:
On this day, 27th October, in the year 1605, the great Mughal Emperor Akbar breathed his last in Fatehpur Sikri, Agra at the age of 63.

In this edition of "On This Day in History", we delve into the life and times of one of the most influential figures in Indian history, Mughal Emperor Abuâ€™l-Fath Jalal-ud-din Muhammad Akbar, fondly known as Akbar. This information could be quite helpful for your IAS exam preparation.
